text: G'day folks, I'm a newbie at this. I've created a custom workflow action. I've sent the schema to the app and got a 201 status and i've set '`published=true`', now i want to test this app in a testing portal (created one) or even install it in a different portal. I can't seem to find it anywhere to install it. How would I do this?

Hello Folks,
I'm wondering why I'm not able to use form field snippet in my module. Whenever I use this copied form field snippet in my module I'm getting the error like this "`Error: Cannot resolve property`" But when I try to remove the snippet the error is not more popping up. Is there any update or changelog from HubSpot side or what? Please help me to figure it out :pray:

``` {% form
	form_to_use="{{ module.HubSpot_form.form_id }}"
	response_response_type="{{ module.HubSpot_form.response_type }}"
	response_message="{{ module.HubSpot_form.message }}"
	response_redirect_id="{{ module.HubSpot_form.redirect_id }}"
	response_redirect_url="{{module.HubSpot_form.redirect_url}}"
	gotowebinar_webinar_key="{{ module.HubSpot_form.gotowebinar_webinar_key }}"
%}```
